solution_line_template: Kim got {kim_correct_easy} points/round x {points_per_easy_correct} round = <<{kim_correct_easy}*{points_per_easy_correct}={points_easy_round}>>{points_easy_round} points in the easy round.

She got {kim_correct_average} points/round x {points_per_average_correct} rounds = <<{kim_correct_average}*{points_per_average_correct}={points_average_round}>>{points_average_round} points in the average round.
She got {kim_correct_hard} points/round x {points_per_hard_correct} rounds = <<{kim_correct_hard}*{points_per_hard_correct}={points_hard_round}>>{points_hard_round} points in the difficult round.

So her total points is {points_easy_round} points + {points_average_round} points + {points_hard_round} points = <<{points_easy_round}+{points_average_round}+{points_hard_round}={total_points}>>{total_points} points.
